member.name: M:CThru.Silverlight.DispatcherTimerRedirects.SetValue(System.Windows.DependencyProperty,System.Object)
member.summary: This SetValue behavior is based on the description provided here: http://blog.ningzhang.org/2008/11/dependencyproperty-validation-coercion_10.html yes. It is totally open to recursive failures and allows invalid values.

member.name: T:CThru.Silverlight.DispatcherTimerRedirects
member.summary: This fake timer will fire only once
